---
title: "Sources"
---

# Required Data Sets

Much of the data in this project was gathered from [CCRL](http://computerchess.org.uk/ccrl/) (Computer Chess Rating Lists) and [TCEC](https://tcec-chess.com/). (Top Engine Chess Championship)

# Additional Data Sets

Additional data to help build this project was taken from [CEGT](http://www.cegt.net/) (Chess Engine Grand Tournament) as well as [FICS](https://www.freechess.org/). (Free Internet Chess Server) 

Data for the AlphaGo vs Lee Sedol and Deep Blue vs Garry Kasparov matches are posted on the internet. This information was put into a tibble.

# Other Sources

The use of artificial intelligence software such as [ChatGPT](https://openai.com/chatgpt/) and [Copilot](https://copilot.microsoft.com/) were used to help with the development of this project.
